Experian is looking for a Software Engineer I to join our Experian Xcelerator program (EX). This is a rotation program, and you will spend two years learning everything there is to know about Experian’s cutting-edge technology.
This is a full-time opportunity and your career at Experian will extend beyond the two-year rotation.
In the EX program, you will have the opportunity to develop your skills through diverse assignments across our business. This 24-month program is a fast track to developing your technical expertise while setting you up for success in a global organization.
